response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe could significantly enhance your business operations. Given its high quality and unique features, I'm confident it will be a valuable asset to you. To make this opportunity accessible, I propose a price of $12,000 for the product. This reflects not only its intrinsic value but also the potential benefits it can bring to your endeavors.
